    About Us

    We are committed to building a sustainable future by fostering a collaborative spirit that creates exceptional experiences, balanced relationships,... and enhances a community’s built environment. Our Company For 35 years, commitment to our Core Values has made Benchmark Construction the ideal building partner for the region's most forward-thinking organizations. Our success comes from a steadfast commitment to the client's vision and a culture of balance, integrity, leadership and loyalty.
